title: Maksim Panin
text:
Maksim Valeryevich Panin (; born 8 June 1981) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He played 7 seasons in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for 4 different clubs.
